metadata.title: CVE-2018-11095 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The decompileJUMP function in decompile.c in libming through 0.4.8mishandles cases where the header indicates a file size greater than theactual size, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(Segmentation fault and application crash) or possibly have unspecifiedother impact.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
